name: rhythmic_pong.exe
description:
They are all available on souncloud for free. I asked permission to bundle them with the game.
- Pat B: https://soundcloud.com/deejaypatb/
- AIIVIIK: https://soundcloud.com/aitor-rodr-guez-gete/



RECOMMENDED TRACKS:
The game was calibrated using the original "Ping-Pong" track by Armin Van Buuren and the 2 remix by Pat B and AIIVIIK available inside the "remix" folder. During the tests I also experienced good results with following tracks:

- Ping-Pong by Armin Van Buuren

- Ping-Pong Hardwell remix

- Musician by Afrojack

- Push by Mydo

- Bigfoot by WW

- Pharoaoh by Jewels & Scott Sparks

- Orchard of Mines by Globus

- Pt 2. Alternative Universe by Tigran Hamasyan

- Anax by XVII

- Achilles by XVII

- Surface by Aero Chord

- (Add here your track)

If you have any of these: try it!

LINKS:

- Entry page ludum dare: http://ludumdare.com/compo/minild-58/?action=previ...
